page.title: 16EBBLE VILLAGES , SALISBURY
page.content: Homington is the smallest. Mostly old,some new property,all expensive. Population about 65. No shop, but it has a church ,closed chapel,Manor House & 14th.c farm.It is not expanding which makes it attractive to retired people. Odstock is alittle larger.Most housing expensive but varied. It has a church, primary school,pub , Manor House, recreation field. Very little expansion. Nunton is the largest & most varied from large Manor House to council housing. It has a church,general store/shop,pub,recreation field & village hall, just East of our area. All 3 surrounded by farm land linked by The Ebble, running East to The Avon & by 2nd class road coming off A338 at Nunton & running towards Shaftesbury.All 3 have bus services.
